title: mordekaiser now the slowest champion?
body: 325 base ms are you serious rito

replies.body: He would have to be 324 to be the slowest champion.

> [{quoted}](name=PRIMAWESOME,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RnPVftJ0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-20T02:26:59.410+0000)
>
> He would have to be 324 to be the slowest champion.

Well he have no mobility skill and no CC. If you take that into consideration Morde is definitely the slowest champ in game.
his new w gives him and an ally 75 ms for a short duration, but still 325 is fecking reddikulus for a champion with no cc.

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RnPVftJ0,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-20T05:03:51.393+0000)
>
> his new w gives him and an ally 75 ms for a short duration, but still 325 is fecking reddikulus for a champion with no cc.

The problem with that is you need an ally and if im right Minions doesn't count.
i dont get why they made him a bot laner, all i wanted was a good top laner and he was good at that, dont get why they made a change, no like he got a new dash or something.
i played him for the first time since the update ..... literally unplayable. i thought nerfing him a million times before was enought... obviously someone at riot hates him.
corki and naut 325 some other adcs 2
Alistar and Nautilus say hi with their 300 move speed...

> [{quoted}](name=BadMrFrostie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RnPVftJ0,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-20T02:44:48.874+0000)
>
> Alistar and Nautilus say hi with their 300 move speed...

ali has 330, naut has 325 as well.
Seems Championselect isn't updated on those stats... Strange since it shows mordes base.
